attributes.action: Stop Baby Ps mother getting a new identity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should this woman get a new identity  where was baby P's human rights when this mother let such abuse go on with her child now she want's to be rewarded with a new identity, we object! The goverment must not allow this. we must be heard for the sake of BABY-P so this situation might never happen again we all know it will but unless we stand united to say enough do something about it nothing will ever change! Any little helps.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
